AnyNumberClipToLimits (FUN)
AnyNumberClipToLimits (FUN)
Â¶
FUNCTION AnyNumberClipToLimits :
Error
Clip an AnyNumber to given limits
The base type of dest will be set to source base type.
In case dest.isPtr = TRUE, the according POINTER (TO data - AnyNumber.u.p.p*) needs to be set prior to AnyNumberAssign().
Returns Error.AnyNumberError if source, lowLimit, highLimit and dest are not consistent.
